mods.name: Balatrobot
mods.description: A Botting API for Balatro.

mods.name: EnhanceAPI
mods.description: Allows for the easy addition of custom enhancements.

mods.name: FederAPI
mods.description: An API library mod that allows to register vouchers, blinds, tarots, sounds, etc.

mods.name: OddityAPI
mods.description: Adds Oddities to the game as a concept. Doesn't add any content on its own.

mods.name: Sound Util
mods.description: Allows you to play custom sounds.

mods.name: 1 Hand? You're Joking?
mods.description: Challenge with just 1 hand every round.

mods.name: 5 legendary challenges
mods.description: 5 more challenges, each featuring a legendary joker.

mods.name: Feed the Vampire
mods.description: Adds a challenge that just gives you Pareidolia, Midas Mask, and Vampire.

mods.name: GoldenChallenge
mods.description: Adds the challenge "Golden".

mods.name: Riff-Raffling
mods.description: start with a negative eternal riffraff you have to get money and win with just common jokers.

mods.name: Stylish Sleeves Challenge
mods.description: Adds the Stylish Sleeves Challenge to the game: The effects of all base game decks apply, X2 base blind score.

mods.name: Last Stand
mods.description: Adds the Last Stand Challenge to the game: Start with $250; after defeating each Boss Blind, earn $10; you cannot earn money through any other means (including selling cards).

mods.name: Nihility
mods.description: Adds the Nihility Challenge to the game: All cards are debuffed. Start with Joker, so Round 1 is beatable.

mods.name: arachnei's balatro mods
mods.description: Collection of balatro mods.

mods.name: Bunco
mods.description: Adds 30+ Jokers and new gameplay mechanics, such as Exotic Suits.

mods.name: Fortlatro
mods.description: A Fortnite X Balatro collab featuring 44 Jokers, 2 Decks, 2 Tarots, 1 Spectral, 21 Consumables, 5 Enhancements, 3 Seals, 2 Booster Packs, and 2 Blinds.

mods.name: Mika's Mod Collection
mods.description: A collection of 60 Jokers, 2 Tarots, 1 Spectral and 7 Decks!

mods.name: Myst's Balatro Mods
mods.description: A collection of mods made by Myst for the game Balatro.

mods.name: SDM_0's Stuff
mods.description: Adds more Jokers and Challenges to the game.

mods.name: Sylvie's Silliness
mods.description: A few decks, jokers, etc. Have fun!

mods.name: TetraPak
mods.description: This mod add quite a few new things,such as new jokers, new consumables, and a Boss Blind.

mods.name: Wiwiweb's Balatro mods
mods.description: Various mods for Balatro.

mods.name: Codex Arcanum
mods.description: Adds a new set of cards: Alchemy!

mods.name: Deluxe Consumables Cards
mods.description: Add Deluxe versions of consumables.

mods.name: The Autumn Circus
mods.description: A modularized Balatro mod adding a variety of content!

mods.name: Absolute Deck
mods.description: Absolute Deck of **PolyGlass**!

mods.name: Ace in the Hole
mods.description: Create a special deck that only contains **one Ace of each suit**!

mods.name: Astronomer Deck
mods.description: A deck perfect for an aspiring astronomer!

mods.name: Borrowed deck
mods.description: Build a big deck with tons of free **mega standard packs**.

mods.name: Dealer's Discount Deck
mods.description: Adds a Deck that starts with the **Clearance Sale** voucher.

mods.name: Deck of 4
mods.description: Create a special deck that only contains **4**s!

mods.name: Deck of 8
mods.description: Create a special deck that only contains 8s!

mods.name: Dice Deck
mods.description: A deck which **doubles** all probabilities, both bad and good!

mods.name: DNA Splice Deck
mods.description: Adds a deck that gives a DNA joker at run start.

mods.name: Double Decker
mods.description: Adds a double-stacked deck to the game.

mods.name: Dynamic Deck
mods.description: Increase rank of discarded cards by 1!

mods.name: Easy Start Deck
mods.description: A deck that starts with a **coupon** and **polychromatic** tag for a good start made for gloc.

mods.name: Eccentric Deck
mods.description: All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized but heavily **biased** towards a specific type. Enhancements, editions and seals are also biasely added to some cards.

mods.name: Enchanted Deck
mods.description: Start the game with some of your cards already be **enhanced**!

mods.name: Expansion Deck
mods.description: Grab more cards than you can hold!

mods.name: Foiled Deck
mods.description: All the cards are Foiled.

mods.name: Foiled Wild Deck
mods.description: All the cards are wild and foiled.

mods.name: French Tarot Cavalier Card
mods.description: Add the card rank Cavalier from the game of French Tarot.

mods.name: Gimmicky decks pack
mods.description: A collection of mods I've made. Mostly exists so that I can assign multiple custom deck images to custom decks.

mods.name: High Card Deck and Jokers
mods.description: Create a deck that references the HighCard Franchise!

mods.name: Joker Only Deck
mods.description: All **Consumables** and **Vouchers** are banned, together with related Jokers, Tags and Booster Packs.

mods.name: Legendary Deck
mods.description: Adds 1 deck (Legendary Deck) and 1 legendary joker (Charon).

mods.name: Mesh Deck
mods.description: Burglar 2.0 !!

mods.name: Number Deck
mods.description: Swaps the face cards for numbers instead. This mod adds a numerical deck.

mods.name: Pact Deck
mods.description: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a **Negative Tag**. and **-1** Joker Slot.

mods.name: Pauper Deck
mods.description: Shop has no Jokers. Open a Jumbo Pack after each Blind. Only Jokers earn you money.

mods.name: Randomizer Deck
mods.description: The Randomizer Deck randomizes itself, jokers, vouchers, planets, costs etc.

mods.name: Royal Deck
mods.description: Adds 1 deck (Royal Deck): It contains only enhanced Aces, face cards, and 10s.

mods.name: ScrapDeck
mods.description: A deck where everything sells at **full price**! Might be overpowered but it's definitely fun!

mods.name: Sylvie's Silliness
mods.description: A few decks, jokers, etc. Have fun!

mods.name: Lemon
mods.description: Lime Deck - Start with a modified deck; -1 discard, -1 hand; The 2's in the deck have one of each (vanilla) seal.

mods.name: Sulfur Deck
mods.description: Start with a Death card and Overstock; Jokers are appear less often (equal chance to Tarots and Planets)

mods.name: Aurora Deck
mods.description: Start with an Aura card; Jokers and Playing cards always have editions; -1 joker slot, -1 hand.

mods.name: Hallowed Deck
mods.description: Planets and Tarots no longer appear in the shop. Playing Cards now appear in the shop by deafult.

mods.name: Turquoise Deck
mods.description: +1 hand size, -1 discard, At the end of the round, change suit and rank of the cards in hand.

mods.name: Ultimate Random Deck
mods.description: Ultimate Random Deck!

mods.name: Voucher Deck
mods.description: Include a new deck which add **1** voucher to shop when entering and **20%** off for vouchers in shop.

mods.name: Wild Deck
mods.description: Start with a Deck full of wild cards.

mods.name: Gold's Cards
mods.description: Adds the enhancement "Rainbow Cards" to the game, which give 3x mult, as well as 4 new tarot cards and 1 new spectral.

mods.name: +1 Shop slot for High Stakes
mods.description: Adds Overstock Voucher (+1 card slot in Shop) to all runs at Blue Stakes or higher.

mods.name: Add +1 Shop to Every Run
mods.description: Adds Overstock Voucher (+1 card slot in Shop) to all runs.

mods.name: Always Show Seed
mods.description: Shows the seed and makes you able to copy it at all time on the options eveon on non seeded run.

mods.name: BalatroQuickLoad
mods.description: I made this module for quick file reads. Repeatedly switching to the main menu was too painful.

mods.name: Better Balatro
mods.description: A mod that changes the gameplay for a fresh Balatro™️ experience!

mods.name: Better Mouse And Gamepad
mods.description: Make mouse and gamepad more efficient and easier to use. For example multiply select cards

mods.name: Better Stakes
mods.description: Rework of orange and gold stakes, making them less challenging and reducing the need to reset for a good start.

mods.name: Card Sleeves
mods.description: Adds fancy sleeves which not only keep the cards cosy, but also apply the modifier of the deck it represents (e.g. get +$10 at start with Yellow Sleeve).

mods.name: Choose First Shop Joker
mods.description: This mod adds a way to choose the first joker that spawns.

mods.name: Collection Fix
mods.description: Fixes the collection to work with amounts of cards that aren't the base game's.

mods.name: Debug Menu
mods.description: Enables Balatro's builtin debug menu. Press TAB to show keybinds.

mods.name: DisableVerdantLeaf
mods.description: Disable Verdant Leaf (All cards debuffed until 1 Joker Sold) on specific challenge runs.

mods.name: Faster Stakes Unlock
mods.description: Winning a run with a stake unlocks the stake 2 levels below for all decks.

mods.name: Flush Hotkeys
mods.description: Adds hotkeys for selecting flushes, full houses and other hand types.

mods.name: Free Reroll
mods.description: Rerolls are free! It may ruin your game experience.

mods.name: GameSpeed Display and Spacereroll
mods.description: Always display the speed. Press the shift key to change speed and space key to reroll in shop, also disable the FPS display.

mods.name: [Hermit Level Up](https://www.nexusmods.com/balatro/mods/331) | [github](https://github.com/LnxFCA/balatro
mods.description: mods/tree/main/hermit-level-up) - Adds a level system for **The Hermit**, increasing its money cap with each level. by [@LnxFCA](https://github.com/LnxFCA)

mods.name: Hotkeys Collection
mods.description: Adds hotkeys / keyboard shortcuts for a wide range of Balatro game actions, designed to be able to play most common hands without having to click very often.

mods.name: House Rules
mods.description: a mod that adds difficulty modifiers to your runs.

mods.name: Increase Shop Size
mods.description: Increase cards that are sold in the shop

mods.name: IncreaseJokerCap
mods.description: Increase Base Joker Capacity.

mods.name: IncreaseSoulProbability
mods.description: Increase Soul Spectral Card Probability To Spawn.

mods.name: InfinteScore
mods.description: A mod to increase the score cap from 1.7e308 to effectively infinite.

mods.name: JimboStats
mods.description: Automatic Run History Tracking Platform.

mods.name: JoJo's Tarots
mods.description: Replaces tarot cards graphics with ones from Jojo's.

mods.name: Masquerade
mods.description: Allows multiple card sprites to coexist and be randomly picked when displayed.

mods.name: Metal Card Falling Sound Effect
mods.description: Replaces default steel card activation sound with metal pipe falling sound effect.

mods.name: Milck QOL
mods.description: Add keyboard shortcuts to the game.

mods.name: Neow Blessings
mods.description: Neow has transformed into a cute little card! Choose between 4 blessings at the start of your run, inspired from Slay the Spire.

mods.name: Quick Restart
mods.description: Quickly reroll ante 1 tags

mods.name: RandomSprite
mods.description: Randomizes the sprites of all Jokers, Vouchers, Boosters and comsumables. This will also randomize all modded cards into vanilla sprites.

mods.name: ReplaceJokers
mods.description: A mod to replace all jokers.  Can be used to make runs that only have a select few jokers.

mods.name: RerollPacks
mods.description: Reroll packs when rerolling the shop.

mods.name: Robo Sorting
mods.description: Adds Joker Sorting with the S key in the shop.

mods.name: Rumble
mods.description: Enables controller rumble support.

mods.name: Seed Challenges
mods.description: Allows seeding challenge runs.

mods.name: Seed Persistence
mods.description: Quick restart seeded runs.

mods.name: Set Seed Achievements Bypass
mods.description: Enables achievements with seeded run.

mods.name: Slower Scaling Ante
mods.description: Slows the ante scaling to a linear pattern.

mods.name: Stickers Always Shown
mods.description: The joker's stickers are always shown!.

mods.name: Survival Mode
mods.description: This mod adds two new game modes: Survival and Survival+.

mods.name: UltraHand
mods.description: Click on the card in the collection menu to spawn, ignoring the card count limit.

mods.name: Balatro Hand Preview
mods.description: Adds a window showing the possible poker hands that you can make with your current hand!

mods.name: Balatro Hand Preview RU
mods.description: Russian translation for Balatro Hand Preview

mods.name: Balatro Safety
mods.description: Presents a confirmation dialogue when you select a dangerous action (like using ankh or hex).

mods.name: BalatrOverlay
mods.description: Helpful game overlay.

mods.name: Brainstorm Reroll Button
mods.description: For use with Brainstorm. Adds an Auto Reroll button to the escape menu and game over screen.

mods.name: Colour Selector
mods.description: Mod for selecting and changing the colours of the main menu background.

mods.name: Custom Fonts
mods.description: Allows setting the game font to a custom font. Must be named "font.ttf".

mods.name: Deck Creator
mods.description: GUI mod for creating, saving, loading, and sharing your own customizable decks!

mods.name: Deck Seer
mods.description: Peer into the future of your deck (see upcoming draws).

mods.name: Deselect All
mods.description: Adds a deselect all button to deselect all highlighted cards.

mods.name: Divvy's History
mods.description: View your last played hand!

mods.name: Divvy's Preview
mods.description: Simulate and preview the score that your hand will get!

mods.name: Escape Exit Button
mods.description: Add an "Exit" button into the "Escape" menu.

mods.name: Fold Button
mods.description: Quickly forfeit your runs with the 'Fold' button!

mods.name: Gay Mod
mods.description: Changes a "Straight" into a "Gay". Also changes "Venus" into "Penis" as a bonus.

mods.name: Hitboxes
mods.description: Enables Balatro's builtin hitboxes. Also shows some other debug information.

mods.name: Hold For Final Hand Score
mods.description: Pauses a moment for the final Chip X Mult count, and another moment for the final hand chip total. Especially noticeable on big hands that trigger flames.

mods.name: [Incantation](https://github.com/jenwalter666/JensBalatroCollection/tree/main/Incantation) | [discord](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1248924034716930100)
mods.description: Enables the ability to stack identical consumables. by [@jenwalter666](https://github.com/cubeanimataz), [@MathIsFun_](https://github.com/MathIsFun0)

mods.name: JCursor
mods.description: Allow customize the cursor.

mods.name: Jimbo's Histories | Run Reviewer
mods.description: Review run after it has ended.

mods.name: Jimbo's Metrics
mods.description: Graph your plays over time, and view your previous hands.

mods.name: JokerDisplay
mods.description: Adds a small window under vanilla Jokers that displays useful information.

mods.name: JokerSellValue
mods.description: QOL mod for Jokers in Buffoon Packs and the shop.

mods.name: Main Menu Tweaks
mods.description: Minor changes to the main menu screen.

mods.name: Manual Flip
mods.description: Adds a hotkey function to flip selected playing cards and Jokers.

mods.name: More Speed
mods.description: More Speed options!

mods.name: [No Background](https://github.com/WilsontheWolf/balatro
mods.description: mods/tree/master/steamodded/NoBackground) [discord](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1231746124994449458) - Disables the background on start. by [@WilsontheWolf](https://github.com/WilsontheWolf)

mods.name: Roulette
mods.description: Adds a roulette to the game so you can lose all your money and loose your run faster, obviously.

mods.name: SeedUnlocker
mods.description: Allows for entering seeds without Balatro's arbitrary character restrictions.

mods.description: Adds a draggable, resizable, customizable clock to the game screen.

mods.name: Taikomochi
mods.description: New zen game mode, loosing is not the end of the run, just restart the ante.

mods.description: Replaces Jimbo in the win screen with tbh.

mods.name: Silver Seal
mods.description: A mod for Baltro that adds in a silver seal which will apply a random edition to the card. Once the card is played a second time a new edition will be applied. The edition will only count after you have played the card atleast once. [@mwithington](https://github.com/mwithington), [@AxBolduc](https://github.com/AxBolduc)

mods.description: This mod changes the standard card colors to be friendly to the three main colorblind types.

mods.name: [Dark Mode](https://github.com/CarrotonMan/balatrodarkmode) | [discord](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1236675603495653416)
mods.description: Changes card textures into a stylized dark mode. by [@Carroton](https://github.com/CarrotonMan)

mods.name: EclipseTextures
mods.description: Aims to give most of the game's textures a dark mode makeover, without many changes to the vanilla look.

mods.name: Game of Thrones Tarot
mods.description: Replaces Tarot cards with Game of Thrones Tarot (HBO).

mods.name: Gradient Suit Colors
mods.description: Adds a color gradient to the suits.

mods.name: Gross Balatro
mods.description: Replaces Gros Michel with actor Michael Gross (and Cavendish with Michael J. Fox as Alex P. Keaton).

mods.name: High Contrast Clubs
mods.description: Replaces default clubs with high contrast clubs, while removing the gradient from them, 2x only.

mods.name: Improved Booster Tarots
mods.description: A Retexture of all of the "booster" tarots to make them look like their effects.

mods.name: Improved four colors of suits
mods.description: Makes the colors for a four-color deck better.

mods.name: Lotus
mods.description: ohhh yeah its lotus time babeyyy yeaaah woo yeah oh yeah yeah woo.

mods.name: Luna's Enhanced Enhancements
mods.description: Modified enhancement textures to fit the pattern of changing the material of the cards.

mods.name: Necrodancer Spectrals
mods.description: Changes Spectral cards into Necrodancer Chars. Soul included.

mods.name: Ogtextures
mods.description: the original textures from balatro 0.8.8.

mods.name: Persona Tarot
mods.description: Replaces Tarot cards with their respective versions from the Persona video game series.

mods.name: Random Dice Blinds
mods.description: Replaces the Blind chips with imagery of Random Dice bosses.

mods.name: Recast Contrast
mods.description: Just a branched off version of the Enhanced Enhancements texture pack that only has the high-contrast card colors!

mods.name: Spectralsbian
mods.description: Spectral cards, but with the lesbian flag colours.

mods.name: Texture Pack
mods.description: Keranik's 4-Color Poker Player's Deck.

mods.name: Texture Pack
mods.description: Red, Green, Blue, Purple Standard Cards.

mods.name: Trans Spectrals
mods.description: Spectral Cards (and spectral adjacent cards) but trans Spectrans.

mods.name: Wilds Texture Pack
mods.description: Retextures all planet cards to astral bodies from the game Outer Wilds.

mods.name: Better French
mods.description: A humble community-made version of the French localization of Balatro.

mods.name: ProperKorean
mods.description: Fixes Korean Translation.

mods.name: Betmma Vouchers
mods.description: 10 More Vouchers!

mods.name: Loop
mods.description: Adds a new voucher called Loop, allowing certain vouchers to be re-redeemed in the same run.

mods.name: Card Back Injection
mods.description: systematically loads all the card back files into the system.

mods.name: Distro
mods.description: Adds Discord Rich Presence support.

mods.name: Center Hook
mods.description: An api/hook to add center cards (joker, voucher, booster pack, consumable cards) to the game.

mods.name: Seal API
mods.description: Easier to add Seal.

mods.name: Myst's Boss Blinds
mods.description: A pack of Blinds.

mods.name: Coupon Book
mods.description: A booster pack that allows you to redeem 1 of 2 vouchers.

mods.name: GoldenChallenge
mods.description: Adds the challenge "Golden".

mods.name: arachnei's balatro mods
mods.description: Collection of balatro mods.

mods.name: Buffon Deck
mods.description: Deck that gives you a Jumbo Buffoon Pack at the start of the run.

mods.name: Better black-stake
mods.description: Makes it so Eternal Jokers can always appear in shops. Makes blackstake increse the odds of Eternal Jokers from 30% to 50%.

mods.name: Flush Hotkeys
mods.description: Adds hotkeys for selecting flushes, full houses and other hand types.

mods.name: Hand of Six
mods.description: Allows you to select 6 cards to play.

mods.name: Quick Restart
mods.description: Quickly reroll ante 1 tags

mods.name: Balatro Safety
mods.description: Presents a confirmation dialogue when you select a dangerous action (like using ankh or hex).

mods.name: Deselect All
mods.description: Adds a deselect all button to deselect all highlighted cards.

mods.name: Gay Mod
mods.description: Changes a 'Straight' into a 'Gay'.

mods.name: Fortune Tree
mods.description: Adds Chinese fortune-based cards Mostly inspired

mods.name: Jokers
mods.description: An example joker card that gives all played cards +2 mult.

mods.name: Parrot Joker
mods.description: Adds, the Joker, Parrot to the game.

mods.name: ShamPack
mods.description: Adds a couple of custom jokers and mechanics to the game.

mods.name: Slutty Joker
mods.description: Adds the 'Slutty Joker' that gives a 2x multiplier if you play a 6 and a 9.

mods.name: sols
mods.description: A joker card that gives you X4 mult if you play at least 4 cards that contain any sequence in DISASTERMODE (5776578588).

mods.name: The Jonkler
mods.description: A simple joker card that gives X1.8 mult.

mods.name: Ganymede
mods.description: A planet card that levels up all hands that contain flushes.

mods.name: Double Seals
mods.description: Adds new Double versions of the 4 base game seals as well as all my other seal mods.

mods.name: Orange Seals
mods.description: Adds new Orange seal When discarded, enhances a random card.

mods.name: Silver Seals
mods.description: Adds new Silver seal When held in hand at end of round, creates 1 spectral card.

mods.name: Humanity
mods.description: An example spectral card that gives you $100 on use.

mods.name: Bezos
mods.description: An example tarot card that averages the ranks of selected cards.

mods.name: Better French
mods.description: A humble community-made version of the French localization of Balatro.

mods.name: Hobby Shop
mods.description: A voucher card that allows you to refresh purchased booster packs.

mods.name: Buffoon Deck
mods.description: Simple custom deck that gives you a Jumbo Buffoon Pack at the start of a run.

mods.name: typist
mods.description: typist is an implementation of fully keyboard-driven UX for Balatro and includes a lot of QoL shortcuts as well.

mods.name: Malverk
mods.description: Malverk is an all-in-one texture manager. With an inbuilt API for AltTextures and TexturePacks, Malverk integrates a simple UI to customise which textures are applied to your game whenever you wish.

mods.name: Planet Card Cash-Out Mod
mods.description: "Use" a planet card while the cash-out animations play

mods.name: Readabletro
mods.description: Readabletro improves readability of the game, especially on lower res screens (Steam Deck) by using a more legible vector typeface and smoothly upscaled card textures.

mods.name: Parrot Joker
mods.description: A custom joker that copies the abilities of other jokers at random.

mods.name: #1 Victory Royale!
mods.description: On win screen, replaces the "YOU WIN!" text with "#1 VICTORY ROYALE!" and the default win music with fortnite default dance.

mods.name: When the impostor is Sun
mods.description: Renames The Sun tarot card to The Sus and replaces its texture.

mods.name: Cartomancer
mods.description: Improved deck view and joker management with stacking and scrolling, capped deck pile and scoring flames customization. Made for long endless runs and crazy modded runs.

mods.name: Blueprint
mods.description: Dynamically adjust Blueprint joker texture to the joker it is copying.

mods.name: ProperRussian
mods.description: Russian localization for Balatro.

mods.name: Altrand
mods.description: Improved Randomization.

mods.name: DebugPlus
mods.description: A simple mod that adds a bunch more debug functions on top of Balatro's built in.

mods.name: json
mods.description: Exposes json.lua as a module using lovely.

mods.name: JSUtils
mods.description: Lets mods add item prototypes, descriptions and custom sprites with simple json configuration files.

mods.name: ScoreImprovements
mods.description: Misc score improvements (Better score display, fixed fire at inf, inf blinds let you win)
